template: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing an end-to-end content campaign task in the {industry} space that involves research, multi-format content creation, consistency across channels, and measurable goals; output only the prompt text under 45 words.
filled_prompt: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing an end-to-end content campaign task in the healthcare space that involves research, multi-format content creation, consistency across channels, and measurable goals; output only the prompt text under 45 words.

messages.content: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing an end-to-end content campaign task in the healthcare space that involves research, multi-format content creation, consistency across channels, and measurable goals; output only the prompt text under 45 words.

message.content: Research patient concerns to develop consistent blogs, videos, and social posts across channels while setting measurable KPIs to track healthcare campaign engagement and outcomes.
message.reasoning:
The user wants a single-sentence plain-English prompt describing an end-to-end content campaign task in healthcare. Requirements:

 1. Single sentence
 2. Plain English (simple, clear language)
 3. Healthcare space
 4. Involves research
 5. Multi-format content creation
 6. Consistency across channels
 7. Measurable goals
 8. Under 45 words
 9. Output only the prompt text (no extra explanation)

 Let me draft something:

 Draft 1: Research patient concerns then create videos, blogs, and social posts that maintain consistent messaging across all platforms while tracking engagement metrics to measure campaign success. (23 words) - This covers research, multi-format, consistency, measurable goals.

 Draft 2: Conduct healthcare audience research to develop consistent articles, videos, and infographics across channels with specific KPIs to track campaign effectiveness. (19 words)

 Draft 3: Research patient pain points and create consistent blogs, videos, and social content across channels with clear metrics to track engagement and conversion rates. (21 words)

 Draft 4: Research target patient needs to produce consistent multi-format content across channels and set measurable KPIs to evaluate healthcare campaign performance. (19 words)

 Draft 5: Investigate healthcare trends to create cohesive blogs, podcasts, and social posts across platforms while establishing metrics to measure audience engagement and trust. (20 words)

 I need to make sure it's under 45 words, which all are. Let me check if I hit all requirements:
 - Healthcare space: yes (patient, healthcare)
 - Research: yes (research, investigate)
 - Multi-format: yes (videos, blogs, social posts, infographics, podcasts)
 - Consistency across channels: yes (consistent across channels/platforms)
 - Measurable goals: yes (KPIs, metrics, track)

 Let me go with something comprehensive but concise:

 Final: Research patient concerns to develop consistent blogs, videos, and social posts across channels while setting measurable KPIs to track healthcare campaign engagement and outcomes.

 Word count check:
 Research(1) patient(2) concerns(3) to(4) develop(5) consistent(6) blogs,(7) videos,(8) and(9) social(10) posts(11) across(12) channels(13) while(14) setting(15) measurable(16) KPIs(17) to(18) track(19) healthcare(20) campaign(21) engagement(22) and(23) outcomes.(24)

 24 words. Perfect. Under 45. Single sentence. Plain English. All elements included.

 Actually, let me make sure "develop" implies creation. Yes. And "patient concerns" is healthcare. "Blogs, videos, and social posts" covers multi-format. "Across channels" covers consistency. "Measurable KPIs" covers measurable goals.

 This works.
